ecommerce.content1: E-commerce is a new form of shopping in Vietnam in recent years. No one can deny the convenience of the fact that e-commerce brings. Just sitting at home, one Smartphone just a few clicks and you have an item delivered to the door right away.
ecommerce.content2: However, just like a "new baby", e-commerce also brings and many problems.
ecommerce.content3: The receipt of other products completely described and pictured posting is not uncommon. After contacting the Service customers, the exchange/return takes place extremely annoying and not Buyers don't always get the support they deserve. Buy product products that take 4-5 days to receive, and when received, the box is no longer intact...
ecommerce.content4: These are problems that have been and are happening every day, and the very thing. This is hindering the development of e-commerce in Vietnam.  SGB believes that e-commerce is a good model, and brings many benefits beneficial to the customer, is the problem caused by the seller? goods have not really done their best role. And SGB wants to change that!
ecommerce.content5: At SGB you will see a lot of policies, services, and experiences that are VERY SPECIAL FINDING elsewhere other. All the things we are and will pursue just to ensure that 100% of customers who purchase at SGB are satisfied.
ecommerce.content6:
Let's see what's good about the Online shopping experience at SGB
Please!

endow.content4: Free delivery within the city or transactions over $100
endow.content5: Secure payment with many different methods.
endow.content6: Can update payment or product return

faq.content11: SGB delivers during office hours, some areas can support evening delivery for customers. SGB does not commit to being able to support 100% delivery cases, but SGB will definitely do everything possible to support customers.
faq.content14: SGB currently has no stores. SGB has 2 operating Hubs and supports customers to buy directly at the Hub for the most realistic experiences
faq.content15: + Koleje Dormitory of Technical University of Ostrava
faq.content16: Working hours: 8:30 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. every day except Sunday and public holidays.
faq.content17: How is the price policy applied when I buy directly?
faq.content18: All customer orders are charged the same price as on the website. Customers can rest assured that discount codes for gift programs,... are still supported like when ordering online.
faq.content19: Just like buying online, customers who buy goods at the warehouse have 2 ways to pay for their orders: cash or bank transfer. SGB has not applied the card swipe method.
faq.content20: with order code or order phone number, customer care will Send the customer the bill of lading code as soon as possible.
faq.content23: What are the payment methods when I make a direct purchase?
faq.content3: How long can I receive it from the time I place an order?
faq.content4: If in the inner city of Ostrava and Prague, customers will receive the goods within 24 hours from the time of receiving a call or a confirmation message, unless the order is not in stock, SGB will be sent from a warehouse operating in another province. time will be 2-3 days.
faq.content5: If in another province, customers will receive the goods in 2-3 days.
faq.content6: Pre-orders will be notified of the delivery date in each program.
faq.content7: However, currently due to the influence of the Covid-19 epidemic, the delivery time in some places may be longer than expected, we hope for your understanding !
faq.content8: How can I track my order?

feature.bitis:
Rubber sole
            IMPORTED QUALITY, DURABLE USAGE. Made in Vietnam. Intergrated unique LiteFlex Technology and premium materials help increase the shoes durability while keeping your feet stay cool every season.
            LIGHTWEIGHT AND SLIP-RESISTANT SOLE. The IP midsole is upgraded with extreme lightweightness (204g) and over 40% increased elasticity. Rubber outsole groove patterns offer a great traction and enhance the shoes slip-resistance.',
            COMFORTABLE UPPER DESIGN. High-quality synthetic upper enhances the lightweightness and flexibility. Stitched air mesh helps maximize breathability and create smoothy experience while rubber heel counter supports your arch.
            TRENDY STYLE. Modern design offers attractive vibes and full of personality. The slim form with foot-cuddling heel-cage and heel-counter wraps your feet gently on every step.
            A PERFECT GIFT FOR SNEAKERHEADS. Exciting gifts for sneaker enthusiasts, family, relatives, friends,..who enjoy comfortable yet staying fashionable. Additional accessories include a non-woven bag and an extra pair of laces.
feature.coat:
DWR (Durable Water Repellent): A special surface treatment of the fabric which makes it hydrophobic - ie durable water-repellent.

            RDS (Responsible Down Standard): A guarantee that the goose down used in the production has been produced responsibly, comes from ethical sources and the manufacturer knows its origin.
            
            PFC-free water-repellent treatment: Here you can be sure that in the production of this piece, no PFCs (perfluorinated compounds) were used, ensure the material water repellency.',
            Material: 100% Recycled nylon
            Care instructions:
            Use only mild washing detergent,

            Do not use bleach,
            
            Dont clean chemically,
            
            Washable in a washing machine 40º,
            
            Dont iron,
            
            Dry in a tumble dryer to a slight degree,
            
            Wash inside out,
            
            Reference:NF0A3C8D7481,
feature.mlb:
Fashionable high heel sneakers,
            MLB Baseball Association Inspired Design,
            Resonance with sharp baseball logo lettering detail,
            Combination of high-quality leather with breathable mesh upper,
            Soft lining, lifting foot shape,
            Modern colors easily coordinate with many outfits and accessories,
            Brand Origin: Korea,
feature.polo:
Material: 50% S.Café + 50% Recycled PET
            Hydroponic technology increases the ability to evaporate water from the fabric, helping to dry quickly
            Suitable for: work, go out
            Style: Regular fit, loose shape
            The neckline uses Hightwisted 45D/75D yarn for stretchy and durable form
            Model: 186 cm - 72 kg, wearing size XL
            Proudly made in Vietnam
feature.shoes:
MATERIALS:
            
            Suede: leather cut from the back, while the fibers remain on the surface, suede is less prone to damage than nubuck.,
            
            Synthetics: unlike textiles, synthetic fibers are stronger, more durable, and quick-drying.,
            
            Rubber: a material that is very easy to maintain and you will appreciate it, especially in rainy weather.,
feature.sport:
Material: 100% Polyester: a very strong synthetic fiber that boasts high heat resistance and excellent odor absorption,
            Care instructions:
            Washable in a washing machine 30º,
            Do not use fabric softener,
            Wash with the same colored laundry,
            Don´t iron over graphics,
            Do not use bleach,
            Don't clean chemically,
            Iron to the lowest setting,
            Wash inside out,
            Reference: DR2616-450,
feature.text:
Composition: 100% Acrylic: A fabric that is soft, doesn’t crease, and dries quickly, but mainly, it is not enjoyable for moths.,
            Care instructions:,
            Do not dry in a dryer,

            Do not use bleach,
            
            Dont clean chemical,
            
            Do not iron,
            
            Washable in a washing machine 30º,
            
            
            Details: Applique with logo,
            
            Reference: AM176D,
feature.tshirt:
Care instructions:
            Should be washed with cold water below 40 degrees and absolutely should not be washed with hot water, which will stretch the fabric and loosen the shirt.

            Do not wash clothes immediately after receiving them. In particular, the first time washing the shirt, please hand wash and wash with cold water or less soap, do not wash in the washing machine in the first wash.

ship.content1: Fast and on-time delivery for 95% of orders is target that the operation team of
ship.content10: However, currently due to the influence of the Covid 19 epidemic, the delivery time in some places may be longer than expected, hope you understand SGB!
ship.content11: NOTE: In case customers need to receive goods urgently, they can contact Hotline SGB 1900272737 for support.
ship.content12: does not promise to be able to support emergencies 100%, however SGB will definitely do everything possible to help customers solve their problems.
ship.content2: aiming. Customers believe in SGB, we can do it!
ship.content3: Currently, SGB is a big partner with 2 famous and reputable delivery units such as Ninjavan and Snappy
ship.content4: SGB has many branches scattered around the world.
ship.content5: Orders arising from Brno back to the North region will be sent from SGB's Northern operation center,
ship.content6: Remaining orders will be packed and shipped from the South Center.
ship.content8: • Orders within Ostrava and Prague: Customers will receive them within 24 hours from the time of order confirmation (unless the order is pre-ordered or not enough). inventory, SGB will send it from a warehouse operating in another province and SGB's customer service will notify the customer about this). Usually it can be earlier depending on the time the customer places the order (Excluding Sundays and holidays)
ship.content9: Other regions: 2-5 days (usually 2-4 days), if you have not received it after 3 days of placing your order. If you receive a delivery call from the postman, please contact SGB for support (excluding Sundays and public holidays).
